ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Fragments

Class ClaimViewerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Fragments.ClaimViewerFragment

  • public class ClaimViewerFragment
extends Fragment
    This fragment is used to view claims and surface level details, including name, cost, status and dates. These fields are prone to change or grow. Outstanding Issues: Getting claimant and approver specific claims should be moved to a controller

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClaimViewerFragment() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void approveClaim()
      An approver will approve the selected claim back to the user, with the updated information (comments).
      void deleteClaim()
      Delete the selected claim and update the view.
      void editClaim()
      When permissible for the user and the clicked claim, change the fragment to the ClaimManager and fill the fields with the existing data.
      void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      void onStart() 
      void returnClaim()
      An approver will return the selected claim back to the user, with the updated information (comments).
      void submitClaim()
      Changes the selected claim's status to submitted, which allows it to be viewed by approvers.
      void viewClaim()
      View the selected claim's claim-level details.

      • editClaim

        public void editClaim()
        When permissible for the user and the clicked claim, change the fragment to the ClaimManager and fill the fields with the existing data.

      • deleteClaim

        public void deleteClaim()
        Delete the selected claim and update the view.

      • viewClaim

        public void viewClaim()
        View the selected claim's claim-level details.

      • submitClaim

        public void submitClaim()
        Changes the selected claim's status to submitted, which allows it to be viewed by approvers.

      • returnClaim

        public void returnClaim()
        An approver will return the selected claim back to the user, with the updated information (comments). TODO approver viewer shouldn't be able to see the returned and approver claims.

      • approveClaim

        public void approveClaim()
        An approver will approve the selected claim back to the user, with the updated information (comments). TODO approver viewer shouldn't be able to see the returned and approver claims.
